trends.name: Obesity Drugs
trends.description: L'évolution vers des formes galéniques orales et la diversification des indications cliniques valident un potentiel de croissance massif au-delà de la simple perte de poids.
key_catalysts: Approbation par la FDA des versions orales (Wegovy) facilitant l'observance
Expansion potentielle des indications thérapeutiques vers le traitement des addictions
Pénétration agressive du marché chinois malgré les pressions sur les prix

trends.name: Nuclear Renaissance
trends.description: The convergence of AI infrastructure needs and SMR commercialization is transforming nuclear energy into a high-growth technology play.
key_catalysts: Exponential power demand from AI data centers requiring carbon-free baseload
Institutional validation through ARK Investment's stake in SMR technology
Global shift toward Small Modular Reactors (SMRs) for decentralized energy

trends.name: Cybersecurity
trends.description: The convergence of insider threats and supply chain attacks is forcing a rapid transition toward Zero Trust security models and internal monitoring.
key_catalysts: Rise of insider threats and malicious security professionals
Critical supply chain vulnerabilities in global manufacturing
Massive-scale data breaches driving regulatory and privacy pressure

trends.name: Crypto Bull
trends.description: Massive institutional capital inflows and large-scale staking are creating significant supply-side pressure on major crypto assets.
key_catalysts: XRP ETF inflows exceeding $1 billion
Bitmine's $1 billion Ethereum staking supply squeeze
Institutional and political adoption initiatives

trends.name: AI Revolution
trends.description: The AI sector is transitioning from speculative hype to structural market consolidation and refined user experience, driven by massive capital flows.
key_catalysts: Strategic M&A activity and large-scale capital deals involving Nvidia and SoftBank
Product evolution toward personalized and human-centric AI interactions
Structural integration of AI into enterprise workflows and governance systems

trends.name: Quantum Computing
trends.description: The shift from large-scale laboratory setups to miniaturized, chip-based quantum hardware is accelerating the global race for technological dominance.
key_catalysts: Miniaturization of quantum processors to chip-scale dimensions
Geopolitical competition for technological supremacy between US and China
Strategic R&D concentration in specialized innovation hubs

trends.name: Space Economy
trends.description: L'économie spatiale transitionne d'une phase d'exploration à une phase de maturité commerciale et de compétition géopolitique intense.
key_catalysts: Accélération du calendrier des missions spatiales prévues pour 2026
Émergence d'une concurrence commerciale chinoise agressive (LandSpace)
Innovation technologique axée sur la durabilité et la gestion des débris satellites

trends.name: Reshoring
trends.description: Offshore operational risks, including cyberattacks and logistics insecurity, are strengthening the strategic imperative for localized supply chains.
key_catalysts: Cybersecurity risks in offshore manufacturing hubs
Supply chain vulnerabilities and logistics theft
Consolidation of domestic building and infrastructure suppliers

trends.name: CeDeFi RWA Infrastructure
trends.description: The convergence of centralized and decentralized finance to tokenize all asset classes (Real World Assets) into a unified 'Exchange of Everything'. This narrative focuses on building the institutional-grade rails for global asset liquidity.
key_catalysts: Launch of All InX platform
Institutional adoption of tokenized securities
Regulatory frameworks for CeDeFi

trends.name: Regional Bank Recapitalization & M&A
trends.description: Strategic consolidation of mid-sized banks backed by Private Equity to create high-performing regional entities. This trend targets balance sheet optimization and scale in competitive local markets.
key_catalysts: Warburg Pincus strategic investments
Regulatory pressure for bank stability
Swiss franc restructuring needs

trends.name: Inclusive Digital Housing Finance
trends.description: Expansion of mortgage and housing credit in emerging markets through digital-first, inclusive lending platforms. It leverages high-growth demographics and digital infrastructure to reach underserved populations.
key_catalysts: Urbanization in India
Digital infrastructure maturity
Government housing mandates

narrative_updates.description: The convergence of centralized and decentralized finance to tokenize all asset classes (Real World Assets) into a unified 'Exchange of Everything'. This narrative focuses on building the institutional-grade rails for global asset liquidity.
